Class Media.Caption

java.lang.Object
  com.instagram.model.Media.Caption
Enclosing class:
Media
public class Media.Caption
extends java.lang.Object

Object for a media caption with the JSON representation 

        { 
                "created_time":"",
                "text":"",
                "from": {
                        "username":"",
                        "profile_picture":"",
                        "id":"",
                        "full_name":""
                },
                "id":""
        }

Version:
2012-08-22
Author:
Sola Ogunsakin
